name: Random Mini Crossword Generator. V 0.01
description:
This is an early version of a random mini-crossword generator.  The generation takes 5 seconds to 2 minutes. 

 There are no clues for the words yet. As a finite being, I don't have the time or patience to fill out all of the clues. Please help by suggesting a clue for the words here:  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfDa_9KsQVFVqu4yNy_p-_KtRcchzt7TXmG0a48...

The source code is available here: https://github.com/Scifitzel/Random-Mini-Crossword-Generator
